author: IGN
description:
Moorwing is one of the first significant road blocks in Hollow Knight Silksong. But he doesn't have to be! Whether you want to beat him without any tricks, get help from a few friends, cheese him to death, or skip the battle outright, here are all of the ways we know about to deal with this tough boss.

#IGN #Gaming #HollowKnight
title: Hollow Knight Silksong - How to Beat Moorwing (Or Skip It Entirely!)

author: IGN

author: IGN
description:
In today’s Daily Fix, we’re running down a few of the release dates for highly anticipated upcoming games that were announced in this morning’s Nintendo Direct. We’ll be playing on Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 in just a few weeks, and soon after that, brand new remasters of Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, which are include new features and up to 4k resolution. Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment also got a release date, along with Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, which we’ve been waiting way too long for. In other news, the Virtual Boy is back, Neil Druckmann is hard at work on Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, and Balatro’s free update 1.1 is not coming out in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Metroid Prime 4, Hades 2 & More Release Dates From September 2025 Nintendo Direct - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Nioh 3 is shaping up to be exactly the same kind of iterative step above its predecessor that Nioh 2 ended up being. The style switching between Samurai and Ninja is an excellent addition that adds new layers of depth to an already stacked combat system, and the new open fields offer up even more incentive to explore than ever before, with fun challenges, mini bosses, and secret treasures to discover in every corner. Previewed by Mitchell Saltzman

#IGN #Gaming
title: Nioh 3 Takes the Fastest Soulslike and Speeds it Up Even More

The Saw Collaboration for Delta Force kicks off on September 23 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, iOS, Android, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Delusion Out of Space cinematic trailer for this upcoming Lovecraftian sci-fi horror shooter game. Delusion Out of Space will be available on Steam, Nintendo, Xbox, and PlayStation in 2026.

You awaken on a mysterious spaceship amidst ruins and chaos. Systems are failing, and the dark corridors conceal lurking dangers. But what troubles you most is the strange voice echoing in your head. It calls to you, urging you to venture deeper into the ship, where scientists once conducted perilous experiments on consciousness.

Tsen’tek of the Nyarlath race sought to unlock new potential for his species, willing to risk everything for this goal. But things didn’t go as planned, and now he’s lost control. Each corner ahead holds the consequences of his audacious experiments, but you press on. Explore the ship, make choices at critical moments, and witness how your decisions shape your fate and that of those around you.

#IGN #gaming
title: Delusion Out of Space - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection announcement trailer for this upcoming compilation, featuring Mega Man Star Force: Pegasus, Mega Man Star Force: Leo, Mega Man Star Force: Dragon, Mega Man Star Force: Zerker x Ninja, Mega Man Star Force: Zerker x Saurian, Mega Man Star Force 3: Black Ace, and Mega Man Star Force 3: Red Joker. Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection is available in 2026.
title: Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection - Official Announce Trailer

description:

Players will set out to overcome platforming challenges alone or with friends across a variety of levels, from Dockyard, Museum, Hike, and more. Human Fall Flat is launching in Spring 2026 for Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Human Fall Flat - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Direct

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo announced new, paid DLC for Donkey Kong Bananza in today’s Nintendo Direct, and we’ve played it! Join Logan Plant and Sam Claiborn as Sam shares his impressions of the new DK Island level and the Emerald Rush mode. DK Island is a nostalgic throwback to the Donkey Kong’s Rare glory days, stuffed with references to Country, 64, Jungle Beat, and more. But the true star of this show is Emerald Rush, a remix on Bananza’s layers that strips DK of all his powers and challenges you to strategically reclaim them on your mission to hoard as much emerald as possible. It’s a fast, frantic, destructive mode that’s shaping up to be a great postgame challenge for Bananza fans. For more on this week’s Direct, check out our full episode of NVC that breaks down every announcement, and be sure to check out Sam’s written DK preview on IGN.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: We Played Donkey Kong Bananza's Totally 90s DLC - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight: Silksong gameplay, we showcase a locked arena/battle room that is within Hunter's March. When taking on a bunch of bugs, Shakra is an optional ally you will get if it's currently located within Hunter's March. Shakra won't be around if you go here too early/late as Shakra does move around different spots on the map depending on your in-game progress.

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Locked Arena/Battle Room - Fighting With Shakra (Hunter's March)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Trailer #2 for Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies, an animated horror installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. This series re-contextualizes the Marvel Universe as Earth's mightiest heroes go head-to-head against a zombie outbreak, turning even the strongest of them into undead nightmares. Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies will be a four-part event on September 24, streaming exclusively on Disney+.

After the Avengers are overtaken by a zombie plague, a desperate group of survivors discover the key to bringing an end to the super-powered undead, racing across a dystopian landscape and risking life and limb to save their world. 
 
Marvel Zombies stars Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Tessa Thompson, Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Hailee Steinfeld, Wyatt Russell, Randall Park, Iman Vellani, Dominique Thorne, and more. The series is executive produced by Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt,
title: Marvel Animation's Marvel Zombies - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo's Fall Direct has come and gone. With it, Nintendo has a announced a slew of new games coming both the Switch and Switch 2. There's tons of new Mario content coming, Including a Super Mario Galaxy Movie coming in spring of 2026 along side the Switch 2 release of both Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2. You can look forward to a whole new Pokemon game with Pokopia, a new Donkey Kong Bananza DLC,. and a brand new Fire Emblem entry with Fire Emblem Fortune's Weave. So much was announced in the Nintendo Direct for September 2025 and we've got you covered with everything announced.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Everything Announced at the Nintendo Direct (September 2025)

author: IGN
description: Are you looking to have an easy time in the Borderlands 4 campaign and then a smooth transition into the endgame? Then look no further than this Rafa Build. Soon you'll be tossing countless grenades and deleting early and mid game bosses without a thought. Rafa's Peacebreaker Cannons cause some serious damage and this is made many magnitudes stronger with the King's Gambit legendary pistol that wipes bosses almost as soon as they spawn. Can't find that legendary weapon? No Problem! This Rafa build in Borderlands 4 will successfully get you through the campaign and well into the endgame with ease, all without any reliance on legendary gear.
title: Borderlands 4: Delete Bosses and Throw Infinite Grenades With Rafa

title: What went wrong with Borderlands 3

author: IGN
description:
In this video, we have what can be a challenging battle arena/locked room in Greymoor. You will run into this if you head to the right side of the map after entering Greymoor -- rather than going to the left to eventually run into Moorwing. The battle consists of five waves of various bird enemies. We suggest one of the easier ways to do it being hugging the far left or far right side of the arena whenever possible.
For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#HollowKnightSilkSong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Battle Arena/Locked Room - Birds Fight (Greymoor)

author: IGN
description:
In this boss fight gameplay, we take on Widow, which is the final fight you need to beat in order to complete the Threadspun Town mission and get Bellhart back to normal. Widow's melee attacks take two chunks of health from you while the projectiles generally only take one chunk of health from you, which is something to be aware of during the fight.

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#HollowKnightSilkSong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Widow (Shellwood)
